author: Unity
description:
Shader Graph Wizard @BenCloward is back to showcase MORE new Shader Graph features coming with Unity 6.3!

Join live to be the first to learn about creating stylized lighting and how you can break up terrain tiling, all in Shader Graph!

Check out Ben's shortform Shader tutorials: http://youtube.com/@UCoG9TB1eL6dm9eNbLFueHBQ
title: NEW Unity 6.3 Shader Graph Features - Custom Lighting Shaders & Shaders for Terrain
